job_title: Environmental Tech I in Medford, NY
pros: Wonderful group of people working together to help people get better from illness. Very professional. Very high skilled individuals who excel in their field.
cons: The building itself is outdated but sections have been remodeled.

pros: Family atmosphere, good ability to make changes quickly and see results. Active Administration that really cares about making this place the best that it can be. Very few agency staff, overall good staffing levels.
cons: Rural area sometimes makes it hard to attract talent from outside the immediate area.

pros: The department I came from are very cohesively within.
cons: Each department is like an island and do not communicate well with each other. No one is on the same page with policies and procedures, let alone when dealing with patients and their care
